//测试BEQ指令：
//beq imm[12|10:5],rs2,rs1,000,imm[4:1|11],1100011
//add 0000000,rs2,rs1,000,rd,0110011

//beq x0,x0,offset=20, 20= 0000 0000 1010
//add x1,x1,x1 如果出错，这条指令会执行
//add x2,x2,x2
//add x3,x3,x3
//add x4,x4,x4
//add x5,x5,x5
//add x1,x1,x1 新指令，如果正确，x1=2，如果错误，x1=4
//add x2,x2,x2 如果正确，x2=4，如果错误，x2=8

//00000000000000000000101001100011
//00000000000100001000000010110011
//00000000001000010000000100110011
//00000000001100011000000110110011
//00000000010000100000001000110011
//00000000010100101000001010110011
//00000000000100001000000010110011
//00000000001000010000000100110011

//001080b3
